trans-unit.source: Specifies the Direct3D surface types that are compatible with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os tipos de superfície Direct3D compatíveis com a classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType> when you assign a Direct3D surface in the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType> quando você atribui uma superfície Direct3D no <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType> in a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como especificar o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType> em uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage.SetBackBuffer%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Instruções Passo a Passo: Hospedando Conteúdo Direct3D9 no WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md).
